attributes.action: TELL US why Angela Merkel is a true politician who REPRESENTS the German electorate WHILE YOU PATENTLY DO NOT REPRESENT THE BRITISH ELECTORATE.
attributes.additional_details: You failed to convince Angela Merkel that she should betray her people and join you in your anti Juncker stand, demonstrating the she, at least has some integrity and probity in her role of representing the people who voted for her.  This is in direct opposition to EVERYTHING the people who put you where you are, want you to do for them.  We know that your mental condition cannot comprehend the possibility that we THE PEOPLE might be right, so you REALLY SHOULD NOW QUIT AND HAND OVER TO SOMEBODY WHO IS NOT MENTALLY CONFLICTED BY HUBRIS SYNDROME.
